thread.title: Fallsview Casino Announces January's Music Roster
thread.title_full: Fallsview Casino Announces January's Music Roster - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Fallsview Casino Announces January's Music Roster
text:
Fallsview Casino
NIAGARA FALLS, ON , Oct. 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ - If your New Year's resolution is to have more fun and to experience more live entertainment then Fallsview Casino is the place to start.
For one night only, Songwriter Hall of Fame member John Oates will headline Fallsview Casino's intimate Songwriters series. As one half of the most successful recording duo in rock history (Hall & Oates), John will take audiences through an acoustic singer-songwriter journey of music, inspiring an evening of stories and songs that have influenced him from roots and blues to a few favourite Hall & Oates hits plus new songs from his acclaimed solo albums.
Returning to the Avalon stage will be crowd-pleasing sing-along productions of Jersey Nights and the World Rock Symphony Orchestra. With a career that spans five decades, singer/entertainer Donny Osmond will delight audiences with some of his biggest singles such as "Soldier of Love", " My Love Is A Fire" and "Puppy Love". Also performing will be acclaimed actress/singer Mimi Choo , who promises a unique concert featuring a mix of her comedic wit and Cantonese pop music.
The complete January 2016 Performance Schedule:
JERSEY NIGHTS
Jan 7 – 14 ( excluding Jan 11 )
WORLD ROCK SYMPHONY ORCHESTRA
Jan 22 – 30 ( excluding Jan 27 )
Jan 7, 12, 13 & 14: Showtime 3:00PM & 8:30PM
Jan 8 & 9: Showtime 3:00PM & 9:00PM
Jan 10: Showtime 3:00PM & 7:00PM
Tickets start at $25
Jan 22 & 29: Showtime 9:00PM
Jan 23 & 30: Showtime 3:00PM & 9:00PM
Jan 24: Showtime 3:00PM & 7:00PM
Jan 25 & 26: Showtime 3:00PM
Jan 28: Showtime 3:00PM & 8:30PM
Tickets start at $25
DONNY OSMOND
Jan 15: Showtime 9:00PM
Jan 16: Showtime 3:00PM & 9:00PM
Tickets start at $45
SONGWRITERS
Featuring John Oates
In the Grand Hall
Jan 23: Showtime 8:30PM
All tickets are $40
MIMI CHOO
Jan 17: Showtime 7:00PM
Jan 18: Showtime 8:30PM
Tickets start at $85
Tickets:
Tickets to the January shows will be available starting at noon on Friday, October 9 at the Fallsview Casino Box Office (on any show date) or at all Ticketmaster outlets. Call Ticketmaster at 1-877-833-3110 or visit www.ticketmaster.ca .
